name: YouTube Black 2013 - custom edited
description:
Just few things edited here, bigger player, border-radius set to 0 and little brigther.

All credits belong to original style by freecyber >> http://userstyles.org/styles/45732/youtube-black-2013

- 16/08/2013 - YouTube new player width fix
- 16/08/2013 - Fix for players with playlists, btw dont use standart and medium player switch, it use only one size. And alsou background fixes on channels.
- 21/08/2013 - YouTube change it again, so another fix, for now is player site only supported for 1920x1080 resolution
- 11/11/2013 - Fix for new YouTube comments, Fix for player and playlist (still only for 1920x1080 resolution)
